translated: The Collection of Long Sayings .
The Discourse on Victory
Whether walking or standing,
sitting or lying down,
he contracts and extends his limbs,
this is the shaking of the body.
Joined with bones and sinews,
covered with a layer of skin,
the body is concealed by the outer skin,
